TopicTitle: "Eve: Order Zero" -- a KSP Graphic Novel (POSTLUDE COMPLETE...bet you didn't see THAT coming.)

Articles.Content:
> 
> Bob is love.
> Bob is life.

And no one ever expects the PHYSICS INQUISITION, brother ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

> 
> And no one ever expects the PHYSICS INQUISITION, brother ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

I have concerns about that inquisition.

Did I mention that I have concerns?

I stressed out over homework this evening and quit an hour early. I've still got a week's worth of science stuff that I forgot to do till Wednesday (I'm a week through it in two four hour sessions. I played ksp for half of the first session to relax and fix the Badlaund and Hazemobile.) and a math sheet overdue a day but only half done. Now to relax again before a weekend of overdue homework.

> 
> Now to relax again before a weekend of overdue homework.

Welcome to the "Eve: Order Zero" General Homework Complaint Thread! I hope it all works out for you, KMC. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

And on an unrelated note, if a passing moderator could close the poll I would be obliged. No hurry--it's just that there may possibly maybe be some more characters arriving in the story in the next few days. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) I was thinking of closing the poll now and then requesting it be removed later on, but if that seems like too much trouble please just go ahead and remove it now.

Results as of this post are:

Bob--32 

Clauselle--22

Tedus--14

Melbe--11

Dilsby--5

Gregmore--4

Thanks everyone for voting!

Kuzzter, I love the start of the new chapter. The moderators are not able to read every post, though, so you might have to wait a while for one to come along and notice your request. > 
> There isn't going to be a rescue mission.

Care to explain that, Kuzzter? ![:mad:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_angry.gif) \*Arms folded, tapping foot, and glaring impatiently.\*

All in fun, of course. As soon as I saw that cockpit the 'Ragdoll Kerbal' song immediately popped into my head.

Gene's lucky he's not an engineer. Engineers may have to spend years in a similar space in some space programs. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) (Although they have access to 'hydrazine'.)

Happy landings!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-09-04T14:38:42Z" title="09/04/2015 02:38  PM" data-short="8 yr">September 4, 2015</time> by Starhawk**

Is this another "The needs of the many outweigh the needs of the few" situation??

Is Jeb going to be the next Captain Kirk??

Will Clauselle sabotage a larger Kerbal ship so that the intrepid three (Bill, Val, and Jeb) can mount a daring and dangerous rescue in a quickly made haphazard ship??

Will our intrepid explorers orbiting Gilly disobey orders and save our valiant two on Eve??

***FIND OUT NEXT WEEK!! STAY TUNED!!***
